actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide soybean producers with the same protection from natural disasters as producers of wheat and feed grains.

summary.text: Makes producers of the 1980 crop of soybeans eligible for compensation in the case of prevented plantings or failure to harvest normal crop acreage because of a natural disaster at rates comparable to those received by producers of feed grains and what under the Agricultural Adjustement Act of 1949.

titles.title: A bill to provide soybean producers with the same protection from natural disasters as producers of wheat and feed grains.
